name: Noted
description:
News are different: one can provoke the public, another can tell about reality, and the third can make you popular at all. Can your newspaper become successful? Can you guess all the secrets of the Helenhound?

Read the news you want to publish

learn about news content

Print whatever interests you!

Sometimes there would be some letters in the table drawer, so won't forget to check it.

Try yourself as the chief editor of a newspaper!

Keys:

  • Move - WASD
  • Interaction with objects - F
  • Pause Menu - Tab
  • Grab objects - click and hold LMB
  • Select Title (on Table) - LMB
  • Unselect Title (on Table) - RMB
  • Open/Close drawer (on Table) - Space
  • Confirm newspaper (on Table) - hold F
  • Reset titles (on Table) - hold R

 This game was made for MFGJ and has 5+ endings. The first game we've ever made.

Languages: En/Ru

Platform: PC
